reviews.review: The game is interesting, you don't play well alone, but for the climate or playing with friends I highly recommend :)
I am Pojop, and this is my favourite game!

The full experience is best achieved with friends. The game can still fully played solo online, but there's emphasis on external means of communication. As in-game you can't communicate with other survivors at all, besides p o i n t i n g.
Very nice game , full of bugs :)

Le meccaniche di questo gioco sono la cosa più divertiti del mondo, siamo partiti dal 2016 con lobby simulator poi tutti i tipi di bug possibili killer volanti roba che esplode mappe rotte..., pero! Grazie al team di DBD, questi bug sono stati rimossi... dopo aver messo in vendita 99 aspetti molto utili, eh beh cosa dire? Dopo 4 anni ancora non ha i server dedicati :) Buon game a tutti!
для тех кто любит не много по бомбить

Симулятор ора в реальной жизни
Это точно лайк

Muito bom, me proporcionou horas de entretenimento. Com experiencia você passa a gostar mais ainda do jogo aprendendo a como, por exemplo fugir de perseguições a salvo ou rastrear sobreviventes. Mesmo com alguns bugs o jogo vale muito a pena se jogado com amigos e é uma pena que não tenha uma comunidade maior.

PS: na minha opnião Dead By Daylight é o melhor jogo do seu gênero, muito melhor que White Noise e Friday 13.
This game is perfect for learning if you let things get to you.  I still have a ways to go.
good job, love all the new dlcs
Okay alone, VERY fun with friends.
amazing game for groups of people and almost always a great time

Левел дизайн полное дерьмо и как будто этого мало кто-то в их студии просто неистово надрачивает на доктора (скил херачит через пол карты, все орут как ебанутые, скил прерывает любые действия) короче полный пиздец хоть иногда и бывает весело
very good. much scare. I like.

I am editing my review due to recent updates. While I still would not recommend this game for many reasons, they finally addressed one of the biggest issues that existed for YEARS where people would sit for as much as an hour waiting on a damn game!

Truth is, this development company clearly cares more about your money than anything else. Again, it took them YEARS to fix a critical problem for this ONLINE ONLY game. Furthermore, look at the prices for their cosmetic DLC? I will NEVER respect a company that has the nerve to charge that kind of money for cosmetics. Some of their character often cost more than the game when the game is on sale and the cosmetics are not! Let that sink in for a moment and you will have a good idea about these developers.

My biggest regret about buying this game wasn't the YEARS I wasted *trying* to play it, or the most toxic gaming community I have witnessed since I was in grade school... No. The biggest problem I have is it is an ONLINE ONLY game, controlled by developers who care about nothing but money.

This steaming pile has ensured I never buy another titles from this company.
Hope you enjoy when they decide to pull their servers making your game useless, or decide to start charging you to play on them too.
good game but not good enough to play it
Very Nice game , often updated and fixed, a wonderful 4vs1 horror survial game , only problem is that the hosts may lag a bit
I fucking hate this game but I constantly play it and have 600 hours in 9 months help

Das Spiel hat einst Spaß gemacht. Jedoch führt das neue MMR-System dazu dass jeder noch mit dem Besten Perks und Items spielt welcher diesem zur Verfügung stehen. Es hat nichts mehr mit Spaß zu tun. Selbst einen Kill zu bekommen ist mit ungeübten Killern eine Qual und das MMR System rankt einen natürlich direkt auf wenn man auch nur einen von vier Kills erhält. Als Survivor ist es am Anfang zwar etwas schwierig, wird jedoch läöcherlich einfach wenn man mit einem Team zusammen spielt.

tldr: dont buy this game, it is killing itself
Отличная игра, бывают попадаюстя кемперы но это редко игра норм!

Survivors are toxic.
Killers are toxic.
But I love it 'cause i'm toxic too :)

如果你可以忍受新手被虐
如果你可以忍受拔線玩家
如果你可以忍受農血點開技能
如果你可以忍受當鬼排隊很久

那滿好玩的

Se jogar como sobrevivente, vai passar raiva com Killers que tunnelam, campam, usam Mori e NOED.
Se jogar como Killer, vai passar raiva com os survivors com lanternas, instalheals e tbag.

Tirando isso, a diversão é garantida. Compre o jogo porque vale a pena!
одна из интерестных игр в своем жанре
Great game, with new characters added throughout the year!
I lub dis gem iz tu gud i wud recomund dees gim 12/10 no problemo with how eet work
Good game to play with friends.

At nearly 1000 hours I can't recommend this game to anyone. The Devs clearly don't care about the community as they keep making backward decisions and implementing stuff that is killing the game. It angers me there is no competition for this game because the Devs won't pull their fingers out their ass untill there is. The fact this game has licenses will keep it going.

The playerbase is a whole other subject matter as it is the most toxic game community I've ever come across. If you play survivor you're an entitled survivor main. And if you play killer you're just a cry baby. You can't win. Even if you play both sides of the game.

You will hate yourself everytime you play this game and you'll be told to kys more times than not in the end game chat, and prepare to have your steam comments raided by angry players if you best them at the game too.

Honestly play something else as this game just makes you stress to another level if you're playing killer and it's so one sided it's unreal, bhvr clearly don't know what balancing is lol. Play civilization or something better
O jogo é mt bom, tirando o lag

I love and hate this game so much.
I've never found a game that I love to play so often but feel genuinely too terrified to play
Lo probé un rato con unos amigos y no me gustó.
da pra se divertir, tirando os bugs.
Comprei DbD mas estava pensando se comprava Friday 13th, o jogo é muito bom nas primeiras horas e para jogar com vários amigos como sobrevivente, sozinho fica sem graça jogar se não de monstro.
excellent jeu entre potes ! malgres quelque cancer
Unbalanced and full of bugs but still really fun to play with friends.

Jogo otimo mas as hitbox bugam muito acontece muito de o hit do killer acertar de muito longe.
Tirando isso jogo otimo
I have 200 hrs on this game and over all game is good but all the bugs need to be fixed . And i think that perks shouldnt have any levels that all of them should be level 3
игра класс!советую.МНОГО маньяков и выживших,частые обновы,советую покупать со скидкой
Hodně dobrá hra a hlavně když to hrajete s přáteli. Jediné co je zlé že se musí koupit dlc.

This game is honestly so much fun! The difference in perspective of Killer and Survivor can create such an anxious feeling, especially in your first few games!

Edit: 1000 hours later. I stand behind my words! This is the longest I've been able to actively enjoy a game! I do think it's important not to go into this game with a highly competitive ideal. If you go in looking to have fun I think you will!
Mega geiles Game! Respekt an die Entwickler, es gibt immer mal wieder kleinere Fehler die allerdings direkt behoben werden, gute Umsetzung einfach nur Top!
